MikroVPS Returns With Eye-Popping Offers in Hungary and France (cPanel from $11.95/year, 1GB VPS with 5TB Bandwidth for $1.66/mo!)

Budapest, cheap shared hosting, cheap vps, cpanel, france, Hungary, strasborg August 18, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

MikroVPS is back!  We haven’t seen them since waaaay back in November 2016.  Üdv újra!

MikroVPS is a well-known Hungarian hosting provider operating in a DMCA-free space.  Some years ago, I was looking for a host in Eastern Europe and LowEndTalk’s @nekki recommended MikroVPS.  If a host is good enough for @nekki, that’s a pretty authoritative recommendation.

Pretty nice offers on some very cheap VPS and shared hosting:

  • cPanel hosting with unlimited bandwidth for $11.95/year!
  • Cheap VPS in Hungary for $1.66/mo for a 1GB with up to 5TB of bandwidth!
  • Offers in France as well!

They are registered in Hungary (HU25189861). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept SEPA transfer, Credit/Debit Card, PayPal, SOFORT.

Here’s a little about MikroVPS in their own words:

“MikroVPS was founded back in 2012. In the last almost 10 years our team collected lot of experience, both in operating services and what need to our customers. We using HP and Supermicro servers. We are also a RIPE LIR.  Our main location is in Budapest, Hungary, but we also have servers in France, and Denver, CO.”

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!
